Use Arbor to analyze your data

There are three ways to use Arbor.

Run Arbor Apps

If you want to run a common comparative analysis in a simple and clean way using a web interface, you can use Arbor apps. Arbor apps are websites that can run analyses - like ancestral state reconstruction and PGLS - using a drag and drop interface.

Use Arbor workflows

If you want to build a workflow for your analysis, you can use Arbor workflows. We current have three Arbor instances running on Amazon cloud that are free for you to use.

Personal installation

You can also download and install your own Arbor instance using Vagrant.
